turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some gift ideas. My brother is really into hiking. Can you recommend some products?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Based on the 'hiking' category, I can recommend a few popular items. How about a high-quality hiking backpack, a durable pair of hiking boots, or a portable water filter? We also have trekking poles and first-aid kits.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, those are pretty standard. He already has good versions of all of those. Is there anything... less obvious? Like, what hiking gadgets or accessories are trending right now? I'm really trying to find something unique, and I'm getting a little frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand. Let me refine the search. How about a solar-powered charger for his phone or GPS? Those are quite popular. Or perhaps a lightweight, packable hammock for resting on the trail? Another good option would be a subscription box specifically curated for hikers, with samples of new gear and snacks. Does anything there spark interest? Also, if he hikes in areas with spotty cell service, a satellite communicator for emergencies might be a good option.
